post_text: Are you interested in serving our school community as a substitute teacher? GMA is looking for qualified candidates to serve in this capacity. Candidates must have a minimum of 60 college credits and a current Indiana substitute teacher license. If you are interested, please contact Ms. Stephanie at sedwards@gma.k12.in.us and Ms. Marca at mbudzenski@gma.k12.in.us.

Books on the Beach was a huge success for our kindergarten students and families! We loved seeing our new friends and had a blast playing literacy-based games with them. Each student got to take home a selection of books to enjoy with their family! Thanks to all who were able to join us for this fun event!

post_text:
Notification from: Geist Montessori Academy

Dear GMA School Family,

In light of Governor Eric Holcomb’s request to slow the spread of COVID-19, Geist Montessori Academy will will have an extended eLearning period from Monday, March 16th, until Thursday, April 2nd, at which time, GMA will have Spring Break until Friday, April 10th. We will be continually assessing the situation, and we will keep everyone updated through the One Call email system.

Students will be in school tomorrow until noon in which the teachers will prepare them for an extended time away.

We appreciate the love and support you have given throughout this trying time for all of us.

Peace and warm regards,

Cindy Schuler

Executive Director

Geist Montessori Academy

(317) 813-4626 cschuler@gma.k12.in.us



Of all things, love is the most potent.

-Maria Montessori

post_text: A big thank you to those who were able to come help unload lockers. It is greatly appreciated.

post_text:
Calling all parents and families. Our lockers that were to arrive tomorrow decided to arrive today. We need help unloading them. They are 80-100 pounds each. They are at the new campus now and will be for the next hour or two until they are unloaded. I know this is spur of the moment but we were not notified before hand. Thank you for your help.

They are unloading them now. Please if you have a few spare minutes stop by and lend a hand. Thank you.

They are unloading them now. Please if you have a few spare minutes stop by and lend a hand. Thank you.

post_text:
Message from the School Board - Lacey Willard

I'm a GMA parent myself, and a new member of the GMA Board as of Tuesday, and am excited to be supporting the "Community Outreach" Pillar. As the Committee lead for Outreach, I'll be seeking to engage with parents, the PTO, the community, and school vendors.

One of the first initiatives will be to create a parent survey, and I'd appreciate if the PTO can share this request for help in gathering questions parents would like us to ask in that survey. I'll hold office hours at the North Campus Tuesday and Wednesday evening if parents would like to meet in person to share suggestions...or if that's not a good time, folks can email or PM me with suggestions. This will get us ready to have GMA Parent Town Halls this Fall (Oct & Dec), and create longer term strategy for constructively engaging parent feedback.

Excited to work with the PTO, our board, our school staff, and community leaders to optimize our kids' experiences at GMA!
text:
Message from the School Board - Lacey Willard

I'm a GMA parent myself, and a new member of the GMA Board as of Tuesday, and am excited to be supporting the "Community Outreach" Pillar. As the Committee lead for Outreach, I'll be seeking to engage with parents, the PTO, the community, and school vendors.

One of the first initiatives will be to create a parent survey, and I'd appreciate if the PTO can share this request for help in gathering questions parents would like us to ask in that survey. I'll hold office hours at the North Campus Tuesday and Wednesday evening if parents would like to meet in person to share suggestions...or if that's not a good time, folks can email or PM me with suggestions. This will get us ready to have GMA Parent Town Halls this Fall (Oct & Dec), and create longer term strategy for constructively engaging parent feedback.

Excited to work with the PTO, our board, our school staff, and community leaders to optimize our kids' experiences at GMA!

post_text: Congratulations to our Robotics Team, Technosquad, who placed 69th in their division at the VEX World Championship in Louisville, KY. It was an extremely competitive event with only a marginal 4-5 point difference between the leading team and the last team. Way to go Technosquad! We are so proud of you!
text: Congratulations to our Robotics Team, Technosquad, who placed 69th in their division at the VEX World Championship in Louisville, KY. It was an extremely competitive event with only a marginal 4-5 point difference between the leading team and the last team. Way to go Technosquad! We are so proud of you!

post_text:
For the first time ever, GMA will be offering summer school. Classes being offered are Math, Reading, Health and Physical Education.

Classes begin Monday, July 25th and run through Friday, August 5th from 8:00AM-12:00PM and will be held at the North Campus. Summer school is FREE and is open to students enrolled in 1st-8th grade in the 2016-2017 school year.

If you are interested in enrolling your student, please complete enrollment form that was sent home and return it to either campus Front Office by Monday, May 2nd.
text:

Classes begin Monday, July 25th and run through Friday, August 5th from 8:00AM-12:00PM and will be held at the North Campus. Summer school is FREE and is open to students enrolled in 1st-8th grade in the 2016-2017 school year.

If you are interested in enrolling your student, please complete enrollment form that was sent home and return it to either campus Front Office by Monday, May 2nd.

Dear Parents,
Please be advised to watch for school delays and cancellations on RTV6, WISHTV8, WTHR13, and FOX59 (CBS4). All delays and closings will now appear as "Geist Montessori Academy." We will do our best to have delays and closings posted by 6:30AM. We will NOT be sending emails to advise of closings and delays. Thank you for your attention to this matter.
